lead_paragraph: In “Don Pasquale” the soprano Anna Netrebko rendered a comic tour de force in the role of Norina when Otto Schenk’s charming production returned to the Metropolitan Opera.
snippet: In “Don Pasquale” the soprano Anna Netrebko rendered a comic tour de force in the role of Norina when Otto Schenk’s charming production returned to the Metropolitan Opera.

headline.main: Oozing Charm, a Heroine Sings, Seduces and Doesn’t Die
headline.seo: ‘Don Pasquale’ at Met With Anna Netrebko - Review
headline.print_headline: Oozing Charm, a Heroine Sings, Seduces and Doesn’t Die
